# Pull Request Template

## Description

<!-- Provide a brief description of what this PR accomplishes -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Tests

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added or updated inline code comments
- [ ] I have updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added examples or usage instructions

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested this locally
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers/devices (if applicable)
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] I have added integration tests (if applicable)

### Git
- [ ] My commits follow the conventional commit format
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main/master
- [ ] There are no merge conflicts

### Security & Performance
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] I have not introduced any hardcoded credentials or secrets
- [ ] I have followed security best practices

## Related Issues

<!-- Link to related issues using #issue_number -->
Closes #
Relates to #

## Screenshots (if applicable)

<!-- Add screenshots or GIFs to demonstrate the changes -->

## Additional Notes

<!-- Any additional information that reviewers should know -->

## Reviewer Checklist

- [ ] Code review completed
- [ ] Tests reviewed and pass
- [ ] Documentation reviewed
- [ ] No security concerns
- [ ] Performance impact acceptable
- [ ] Ready to merge
